definition.para: The complete name including file extension of a digital file representing a resource to be described by one or more property/value pairs in CONTENTdm.

instructions.para: Enter the name of the digital file representing the compound-object item, that is, an access item.
Enter the name of the digital file representing the standalone object, that is, an access item.

customization.para: When entering values in a metadata spreadsheet, each row will include values describing a resource--either a compound object, compound-object item, or standalone object.
Each row describing either a compound-object item or a standalone object must include a filename provided as a value for this property.
Enter the filename of the image file for the page described in the spreadsheet row.
When entering values in a metadata spreadsheet, each row will include values describing a resource--either a compound object, compound-object item, or standalone object.
Each row describing either a compound-object item or a standalone object must include a filename provided as a value for this property.
For ballads, compound-object items will either be audio files, image files (photographs) of a singer, or musical transcriptions (image or PDF files).
For oral histories, compound-object items will either be audio files, image files (photographs) of an interviewee, or transcripts (PDF files).
Provide the name of a file which is to be loaded as a CONTENTdm compound-object item.
When entering values in a metadata spreadsheet, each row will describe either a compound object or compound-object item.
A filename must be provided for every compound-object item. Filenames should not be provided for compound objects.
For oral histories, compound-object items will be video files, audio files, and transcripts (PDF files).

admin.para: The Original File Name element is conceived of as useful also for metadata spreadsheets, in which a filename must be provided for each row corresponding to either a standalone object or compound-object item.

history.justification: Property exists in Special Collections Oral Histories Data Dictionary, defining for continued use and output to HTML MAPs.

changeLog.change: Update property per information from ITS-DS. 'Original File Name' information is desired for CONTENTdm resources. Used settings made by ITS-DS for the Greek dances collection to update property info.
Add guidance for Tacoma Japanese Language School Project - temp_alias_001
